description: This file defines a Flutter widget class 'SongTile' that displays song information with UI controls for play and favorite actions, along with an internal '_AlbumThumb' widget for album artwork or indicator.

classes.name: SongTile
classes.description: A stateless widget representing a song item with controls for playing and favoriting.

classes.name: _AlbumThumb
classes.description: A private stateless widget used within 'SongTile' to display album artwork or indicator.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI for the 'SongTile' widget.

methods.name: _AlbumThumb.build
methods.description: Builds the UI for the '_AlbumThumb' widget.
